title: (x) tech sans and script in Computer Arts - FF DIN, Snell Roundhand {Dan R, Mike F}
content:
hi.  
Plz help me to identify these typefaces. Its a page from Computer Arts(september’06 Issue).This is a part of my publication design class to identify all these fonts and then rework on the whole layout of the page. I though its DIN but the dots(full stop) in the din are rounded and here its not.

Plz answer the one which is circled in the red.

thank you  
satya

 ![](files/for ID for typophile_5250.jpg)
author: satya

comments.content: It IS Din. But remember there are a couple of different “cuts” of DIN.

1. FF Din, from FontShop, not one of the other one’s (like Linotype’s DIN 1451)  
2. Don’t know :(
